mention.text: a coin image of President Bakili Muluzi with that of his predecessor
President Bakili Muluzi with that of his predecessor
Blantyre High Court Judge Eric Kumitsonyo
Mchami , who asked his pupils to measure the images during a lesson on circumference and circles
